title: oceania community
body: there's only a league community opening up in australia which does not help the league community in new zealand it leaves us out.{{item:3070}} {{item:3151}}

replies.body: yea thats true actually our league community is quite big but there's no support for them in nz {{item:3097}}

Just to add to LemonHunters comments;

We definitely support a bunch of communities in NZ! I've listed a few for you below, and if you want to get involved I'm here to help =)

https://www.facebook.com/ApogNZ/
https://www.facebook.com/groups/lolnz/
https://www.facebook.com/groups/UoALoL/
https://www.facebook.com/groups/AUTLOL/
https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersOfCanterbury/
https://www.facebook.com/UCGamingGuild

I know that if you were to run community events localised to NZ, Riot would definitely help support you! They might not always be able to head on over and directly be a part of the NZ community, they will definitely be able to support you if you want to run community events, just like they do here in Aus. Definitely hit them up (Maraudaur will be one to speak to I believe).

Plus there are a lot of other community organisers that would be happy to answer any questions you may have, myself included :)

Do you mean the community specialist position in the Riot games office? 
If so, that is because the Oceanic Riot office is in Australia. They still work heaps to help organize things that have an impact in all Oceanic countries. 

If you mean something else, what do you think can be done to improve?
